text: Marvel's Runaways is an American TV series and the first Hulu series of the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU). Based on the Marvel Comics superhero team of the same name, the series was created by Josh Schwartz and Stephanie Savage and was on Hulu from November 21, 2017 to December 13, 2019. The series was produced by Marvel Television. == Episodes == == References == == Other websites == * * Category:Marvel Cinematic Universe television series Category:Hulu original series Category:2017 American television series debuts Category:2019 American television series endings Category:Superhero television shows Category:2010s LGBT television series Category:English-language television programs
title: Runaways (TV series)
